//Onboarding Screens //Headings Welcome Search Recipes Save Recipes Schedule Meals
//Description Lutong Pinoy is a mobile Filipino recipe app\n that can help you plan and prepare meals. You can browse through multiple Filipino recipes with the search feature. You can create and save your own recipes in\n the app. You can also share recipes to your friends and family with the share feature. You can prepare and schedule your own meals using the meal planner feature.
